titleStmt.title: The fetching home of May: or, A pretty new ditty wherein is made knowne, how each lasse doth strive for to have a green gowne. To the tune of, Roome for company, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: For J. Wright junior, dwelling at the upper end of the Old Baily.,

notesStmt.note: In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the upper end of the Old Baily.
